title: Run For Life Lyrics Biriyani
stanzas: <div>Run For Life Lyrics Biriyani

oru pocket biriyani
venum
aatathukku variya nee
ok
five more nimidam
neeyiruntha varum paaru
sunami
phsyco unit

machi prachana vandha oadu
hide outu shelter-a
konjam thaedu
kannuku munnukku
nikiradhu yaaru
oru plate biriyani
nala bejaaru

steadya machi oadu oadu
machi vidama
sakka podu podu
you can run machi
you can’t hide
i’m watching you now
run for your life
run for your life
run for your life
run for your life
yeah run for your life

here we go.. here we go
thappika paaru
bullet pola therikka oadu
maatuna sangu
oothum theriyumula?

escape panna nee
paathalum vazhiyilla.
ah it’s a dead end bangu
aapu kannukku theriyathu
bangu sikkikitiye
appuram nee muzhikkaatha
thappu pannitu thappika nenachu
pozhachukka machi

badboys never give chances
so don’t take one
coz you just have none huh!!
click click
bang bang bang

thambiyodu thappiyodu
thirumbi nee paakaama
biriyani kekuthaa goyyala
seiyum thappa theriyira
maathiri seiyaatha
no they will keep coming cha
so better watch out
ok take care bye machan
peace out come on

oodura nariyila
athu andha rendu nari
thaanaa naa naa naa naa

siraiyile adaicha
kizhiyum thunimani
lungi thaanaa naa naa naa naa

mallaakka paduthu
allaakka yosichu
machi nee paaru.
maatuna mavane thanni saaru
oliyira manney
 sir-u yaaru?
vedikka porandaa!

hey kazhuvura meenula
nazhuvura meena!
mazhaiyila nananja
kozhi pola veena!
you better keep on running..
dont stop!
now back to beat yeah!

vaeliyila pona onaaiyathaan
vetiyila uttukunom
evano kudicha sarakku
bill-ah thalaiyila kattikinom

summa kidantha sanga
oothi vambila maatikinom
koli soda kudikka poyi,
andha goli thondaiyila maatikkichu

udhavaatha thappuku
adi odha vaanguna
onnume puriyama
oadithaan oliyirom

ariyaadha vayasilathaan
anjaaru peru sernthu
thirudan police aatam
appa aadinom

seiyaatha thappuku thaan
nejamana police kitta
mudiyama muttu sandhula
ippo oadurom.

piecethaan irukanum
adhu thaan da biriyani
elumbu thaan potutu
kuskava thariya nee.

chinna thandaiya pottu
keluthi viralalu
rendaiyum pidiponda.

beedi sandaiya vaangi
soda bottle la
sandhula viduvonda.

oc-la thinnuttu easy ah
 udamba yethuvomda!
police pudicha poiya solli
number plate-a
naanga maathuvomda!

pala naalu thirudan thaanda
oru naalu maatuvanu
evan thaan sonnan
avana konjam kaatuda!

thiruda thaan theriyila na
pathunga thaan theriyanunda
oada theriyila na
odhunga theriyanuda.

rammiya vachu nee
jokera poduda
thothuthita porupilla
mangatha aaduda!

seo.title: Run For Life Lyrics Biriyani
seo.description: Get the complete Run For Life Lyrics Biriyani from Biriyani. composed by Yuvan and sung by Gaana Bala. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Biriyani, Yuvan, Gaana Bala, Psycho Unit, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
